files.name: main.py
files.content:
# Fee, Allan Mid Term Program 2019-16-10

print('Planet Express Delivery Time Calculator')

PlanetName = input('What is the name of the planet?')

print('')

Distance = input('How many parsecs away?')
Distance = float(Distance)

print('')

NumberPackages = input('How many packages?')
NumberPackages = int(NumberPackages)

print('')

Weight = input('How many tons does each package weigh?')
Weight = float(Weight)
print('')

if((NumberPackages >= 10 and NumberPackages % 2 == 1.0)):
  print('')
  print('Warning: Adjusting package count to',NumberPackages + 1)
  NumberPackages = NumberPackages + 1
  NumberPackages = int(NumberPackages)
  print('The total cargo weight is',Weight * NumberPackages,'ton(s).')
  print('The trip to',PlanetName,'will take',(Weight * NumberPackages + 1) * (Distance),'minutes.')
  print('The trip back to Earth will take',Distance,'minutes.')
  TotalTrip = ((Weight * NumberPackages + 1) * (Distance) + (Distance))
  print('The total trip time is',TotalTrip,'minutes.')
  
elif(PlanetName == 'Robot Planet'):
  print('The total cargo weight is',Weight * NumberPackages,'ton(s).')
  print('The trip to',PlanetName,'will take',(Weight * NumberPackages + 1) * (Distance),'minutes.')
  print('The trip back to Earth will take',Distance,'minutes.')
  TotalTrip = ((Weight * NumberPackages + 1) * (Distance) + (Distance))
  print('The total trip time is',TotalTrip,'minutes')
  print('Also, Bender is great!')
  
elif(Distance < 1):
  print('Error:',PlanetName,'must be one or more parsecs away')
  
elif(Distance and NumberPackages >=1 and (Weight >= .01)):
  print('The total cargo weight is',Weight * NumberPackages,'ton(s).')
  print('The trip to',PlanetName,'will take',(Weight * NumberPackages + 1) * (Distance),'minutes.')
  print('The trip back to Earth will take',Distance,'minutes.')
  TotalTrip = ((Weight * NumberPackages + 1) * (Distance) + (Distance))
  print('The total trip time is',TotalTrip,'minutes')
  
elif(NumberPackages == 0):
  print('Error: The ship must carry at least one package')
  
elif(Weight < 0):
  print('Error: The package weight',Weight,'is too light')
